channel.title: Hosting your server without a wireless router [NOOB FRIENDLY]
channel.description:
[center][b]Hey it's Daniel™, Today I'm showing you: "Hosting your server without a wireless router". First off go to [url=http://www.no-IP.com]No-IP.Com[/url]
[img]http://i1082.photobucket.com/albums/j365/Daniel_Dodson95/Hosting/No-IPcom.jpg[/img]
Signin
[IMG]http://i1082.photobucket.com/albums/j365/Daniel_Dodson95/Hosting/Signin.jpg[/img]
Go to
[IMG]http://i1082.photobucket.com/albums/j365/Daniel_Dodson95/Hosting/Host-Redirects.jpg[/img]
Select "Add a host"
[IMG]http://i1082.photobucket.com/albums/j365/Daniel_Dodson95/Hosting/Addahost.jpg[/img]
Create a IP then Create Host
[IMG]http://i1082.photobucket.com/albums/j365/Daniel_Dodson95/Hosting/Createhost.jpg[/img]
Go back to [url=http://www.no-ip.com/]No-IP.com[/url], then go to
[IMG]http://i1082.photobucket.com/albums/j365/Daniel_Dodson95/Hosting/Download.jpg[/img]
Download the one for your computer and install
[IMG]http://i1082.photobucket.com/albums/j365/Daniel_Dodson95/Hosting/Select.jpg[/img]
After it is installed login with your No-IP info
[IMG]http://i1082.photobucket.com/albums/j365/Daniel_Dodson95/Hosting/loginagain.jpg[/img]
Press Select host after you've logged in, then check the one you want. save! (note: No-IP must be running at all times for your server to work)
Now go to Control Panel then click
[IMG]http://i1082.photobucket.com/albums/j365/Daniel_Dodson95/Hosting/almostfirewall.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1082.photobucket.com/albums/j365/Daniel_Dodson95/Hosting/firewall.jpg[/img]
then go to "Exceptions"
[IMG]http://i1082.photobucket.com/albums/j365/Daniel_Dodson95/Hosting/Addport.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i1082.photobucket.com/albums/j365/Daniel_Dodson95/Hosting/addaport.jpg[/img] Save that, Add your IP to your client and your good to go! Credit: ALL MEE! [/b][/center]

Nice Tut, simple steps. Hell if it were up to me I would make it a sticky lol

We have enough of these.

huh? i just took like a hour on this…

Mhm… NP! and erg…

item.description:
@Daniel8 wrote:

[center][b]Hey it’s Daniel™, Today I’m showing you: “Hosting your server without a wireless router”. First off go to No-IP.Com

Signin

Go to

Select “Add a host”

Create a IP then Create Host

Go back to No-IP.com, then go to

Download the one for your computer and install

After it is installed login with your No-IP info

Press Select host after you’ve logged in, then check the one you want. save!
(note: No-IP must be running at all times for your server to work)

Now go to Control Panel then click

then go to “Exceptions”


Save that, Add your IP to your client and your good to go!
Credit: ALL MEE!
[/b][/center]
